message: When we reach the tower, we slip around back to the employee entrance.
There aren't many visitors around... or much security, just two guards standing by to let vehicles in through the gate.
We watch from a nearby alley.

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "We'll crash in and keep security busy while you guys head inside."

name: 紅雀
message: "You sure about that? They might be packing."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "This is just what we heard from the cops, but they say the guards here only carry non-lethal so as not to upset the customers."

name: 紅雀
message: "Okay, but be careful. I need you guys."

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "No problem, boss!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Let's do this!"
The Beni-Shigure guys tear out of the alley and sprint for the gate.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "What the―"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Sorry, boys!"
They pounce on the distracted guards and the scene descends into chaos.

name: 紅雀
message: "Our turn!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let's go!"
Koujaku and I break for the staff entrance.
Halfway there, more guards appear to block our way.

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Stop!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Not happening!"
Koujaku blocks the guard's baton with one arm and punches him in the gut.

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Ugh!"

name: 警備Ｃ
message: "Shit! Stop right there!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah!"
A guard comes at me. I quickly dodge to the side.
He stumbles, and I throw a kick square into his back.

name: 警備Ｃ
message: "Guh!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "How 'bout another?"
I stomp on his back as he lurches forward, knocking him into the pavement.
The Beni-Shigure members are going wild around us, climbing on the guards' backs, even picking them up and swinging them around.

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"
Koujaku calls my name. I join him, and together we run for the entrance.
